name: Dreamwalker Boots
tooltip:
Dreamwalker BootsLevel 60

Rayne at Light's Hope Chapel in the Eastern Plaguelands will make Dreamwalker Boots if you bring her the following: 1 Desecrated Boots, 12 Wartorn Leather Scraps, 3 Mooncloth and 2 Cured Rugged Hides.

Requirements:
- Desecrated Boots
- Wartorn Leather Scrap x 12
- Mooncloth x 3
- Cured Rugged Hide x 2
